cmp: 占 (to observe/to divine, to divine, to occupy/to constitute/to make up/to account)

exm.mng: muddy, covered in (mud, dust, sweat, blood etc), daubed in
Zhanyi county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan
to moisten the flower and beckon the leaves (idiom); to womanize, to frequent brothels, to sow one's wild oats
